H0.text: Argon, Ar is a component of air that is a compound rather than an element.

H1.text: Oxygen (O₂) is a compound, not an element, that is one of the components making up air.

H2.text: Water (H₂O) is the compound component of air, among the many substances that compose air, rather than an element.

H3.text: Nitrogen, N₂, is a compound that composes air, rather than an element, as air is composed of many different substances.
